name: Persona (Cyaygel)
description:
Persona is a topdown shooter which I inspired from the movie Everythin Everywhere All at Once. Fight scenes there really had an impact on me. And the theme is kind of crappy. Sooo why not a lazy ludum dare?

Main Concept is U fight as different personas of your in different timelines. So every time your persona changes your health refreshes. Rest is pretty straight forward. Well known traditional indie shooter. I hope you ll havefun. Dont forget to check the quick tips.
